resolution: Feature already implemented in PR #1512 (commit 88f19877), merged Dec 28, 2025

details.refactoring_summary: Deep nesting in http2_validate_headers was eliminated by extracting validation logic into three helper functions: validate_pseudo_header(), validate_regular_header_entry(), and validate_required_pseudo_headers(). Main loop reduced from 5-6 nesting levels to 2-3 levels.
benefits_achieved: Reduced nesting from 5-6 levels to 2-3 levels
Early returns in helper functions for clear error paths
Each validation concern isolated in testable functions
